snippet: Mr. Nicolaescu was a Social Democratic Party senator from 1992 until he stepped down last month.
abstract: Sergiu Nicolaescu, popular Romanian director who also served for 20 years as senator, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Nicolaescu was a Social Democratic Party senator from 1992 until he stepped down last month.

headline.seo: Sergiu Nicolaescu, Romanian Film Director, Dies at 82
headline.main: Sergiu Nicolaescu, Romanian Film Director, Dies at 82
